name: Picnic Invaders!!!
description: This is an entry for the Game Off 2021 game jam which was active between 1/11/2021 to 1/12/2021. You and your family are enjoying a picnic in the beautiful summer at the local park, however a horde of famished ants intend to steal your family's picnic basket in order for fulfill thier hunger. Can you defend the picnic basket by stomping on the ants before they take that picnic basket away from you and ruin your family's day? This game is a 2-D action-arcade game.
